items.sentence: Tom always stays at school as late as the teachers allow him to.

I just want to know why you didn\'t come over to help yesterday.
Tom couldn\'t get to the ski area because the roads were closed.
Tom doesn\'t want to spend more than $300 for a used motorcycle.
Tom says he\'ll pay back all the money he owes me before Monday.
I didn\'t know that the cost of living was so high in Australia.
This is the first time that I\'ve ever put out a fire with sand.
Tom is not the only one who thinks it\'s a good idea to do that.
Tom is quite determined to finish the report by 2:30, isn\'t he?
He was disappointed that things didn\'t turn out as he\'d hoped.
In the near future, space travel will no longer be just a dream.
Could you please show me a camera that\'s cheaper than this one?
It never occurred to me that someone would make up such a thing.
One hour of sleep before midnight is better than two afterwards.
One of the most urgent challenges of our time is climate change.
Last night, the temperature went down to ten degrees below zero.
My mother made me practice the piano every day when I was a kid.
I made Tom promise that he wouldn\'t tell anybody what happened.
It would be better for both of us not to see each other anymore.
